20101216034706.286|20101216034707.714|CCO|>> THAT'S RIGHT.

20101216034710.571|20101216034712.000|CCO|CLEAR, THEY CLASSIFY IT AS 
20101216034712.000|20101216034713.667|CCO|MINIMALLY INVASIVE.
